attributes.action: Sort out imigration in the uk
attributes.additional_details: We need to sort out imigration, imigration is a good thing it contributes to the uk economy we want imigration to continue in the uk, the working immigrants should be entitled to what the British working people are entitled to due to them paying taxes and national insurance what we don't want is immigrants just coming to our country to use the benefit system and living of the working class people by getting everything handed to them on a silver plate
attributes.background: We need to sort Imigration out
